sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SENESCHAL (Seneschallas), derived from the German sein, “ a house or place,” and scale, “ an officer,” is a steward, and signifies one who has the dispensing of justice in some particular cases : as the high seneschal or steward of England ; seneschal de la hôtel de roi, “ steward of the king’s household, seneschal or steward of courts.” ( co. Lit. 61 ; Croke’s Juried. 102; Kitch. 83.)
